help-file.title: "RAISE ZOMBIE"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <corpse> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Animation lasts until undead follower dies (again) Type of spell: Summoning
"Raise Zombie" recalls the soul of the slain to their corpse, creating a zombie. Zombies are weaker warriors than vampires, their strength comes mostly from sheer numbers.
